channel.title: The Nextcloud Podcast
channel.googleplay:author: Nextcloud
channel.itunes:author: Nextcloud
channel.itunes:subtitle: Stay up to date with the Nextcloud community!
channel.itunes:summary: The Nextcloud Podcast interviews Nextcloud community members, contributors, users and others, keeping you up to date on what is happening.
channel.description: The Nextcloud Podcast interviews Nextcloud community members, contributors, users and others, keeping you up to date on what is happening.

item.title: Welcome to our first Nextcloud Podcast!
item.itunes:summary: In this very first episode we introduce our podcast, discussing with Nextcloud designer and community manager Jan Christoph Borchardt what our podcast will be covering going forward.
item.description: In this very first episode we introduce our podcast, discussing with Nextcloud designer and community manager Jan Christoph Borchardt what our podcast will be covering going forward.
item.itunes:author: Nextcloud
